answers.answer: I'm going thru a day of vomit and not eating wth my little one too...but by noon the vomiting for her ended, still no interest in food yet...BUT mine is not falling over NOR crying and hiding...this is much more urgent!!! Somethg sounds seriously wrong...an injury? Ingested somethg?Has yours had a recent bowel movement??? Possible obstruction?? I know if mine were showing all the signs ur describing I would rush to the nearest Vet clinic...they DO have after hours emergency Dr. On call u know.......praying for her:(
She hasnt used the bathroom at all now she is laying  down, barely able to walk and complains here and there, she was fine last night
She NEEDS TO GO TO EMERGENCY____NOW!!!!!!!!

Defintely take her to emergency if you haven't already. The poor thing, she's very sick. I am not trying to scare you or anything but this sounds like an emergency. I had a kitten who acted like that all of a sudden out of the blue and it turned out he had Feline Lukemia (sp).
I hope you have taken her in to see a vet. This can be a virus, or bacterial infection as well as something serious like pancreatitis, FL, or diabetes. I hope she is well now!
I hope you took her to the vet! That does not sound good at all poor thing! :((
Hi Nat,Could you update us on your baby! We worry too, and it sounded very serious. Has she seen the vet?Thanks,CML
How’s the little kitten? She sounded really sick.An update will be great.Best of luck.

question: I have a kitten about 4 months old, she was fine yesterday but now she is throwing  up clear liquid won't eat or drink. She can  barely walk and when she does she falls over,  hids and cries :( i dont know  whats going on. Im scared she wont make it through the night. What should i do?
title: baby
